author: yutazzz
title: Encourage DeFi/Dapps/NFT project
description: Now, several DeFi and Dapps Project were developed. How we distinguish the good project and scam project? The community opinion is important
importance: There is no best method for check DeFi and Dapps before starting. However, we can encourage "Honest project" after starting by Catalyst.
success: The goal of this challenge is simple. When we succeeded to encourage good early DeFi and Dapps Project by Catalyst. This is enough.
